content.title: Understanding FlexLayouts
content.body:
This hike covers the basic layouts of the FlexContainer widget. Volt MX AppPlatform supports three flex layouts:
  • Free Form
  • Flow Vertical
  • Flow Horizontal

These Flex layouts help you to arrange the widgets inside a container widget such as FlexContainer.
Letâ€™s see how to implement these layouts and how the widgets are arranged in each of these layouts.
